jot.math.geometry

Class TransformGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.TransformGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Node, Transformable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreGameObject

    public class TransformGroup
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Node, Transformable
    Class that implements a transformGroup, i.e., an object that contains one or more sub-meshes each with one associated BV.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
